headline: Comcast NBCUniversal Strikes New Partnership Deal for Olympic Games Through 2036
summary: The move extends Comcast’s media rights to the Olympic Games on its various platforms in the U.S. through 2036.

headline: IOC and Comcast NBCUniversal Agree on Groundbreaking Partnership for the New Digital Era, Including an Extension of Their Olympic Media Rights Agreement Until 2036
summary: LAUSANNE, Switzerland & PHILADELPHIA, March 13, 2025--The International Olympic Committee (IOC) and Comcast NBCUniversal have agreed on a new groundbreaking partnership for the new digital era, taking advantage of the opportunities offered by the rapidly developing media landscape and the unique expertise of the global media and technology company.

headline: Comcast to Host First Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call
summary: PHILADELPHIA, March 13, 2025--Comcast Corporation will host a conference call with the financial community to discuss financial results for the first quarter on Thursday, April 24, 2025, at 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time (ET). Comcast will issue a press release reporting its results earlier that morning.
